hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
# change the vctools version to the git commit id export COMMIT_ID=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) sed -i "s/.*#define _VCTOOLS_VERSION_.*/#define _VCTOOLS_VERSION_ \"${COMMIT_ID}\"/" harvester/inc/vcVersion.h
# copy all the files to git dir mkdir "${LINUX_GIT_DIR}" cp -r * "${LINUX_GIT_DIR}/."
#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Run tests cd $WORKSPACE rm -rf tbuild64 mkdir tbuild64 cd tbuild64 cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ cp /mnt/nfs/shared/Jenkins/vc_ltest_add_dir vc_test_add_dir $VECTORCAST_DIR/vpython VcRunTests.py
